title: Binding
body: My right mouse click is starting to not work and i wanna change it to left click but when i go to bind it in the game it won't let me it will only let me bind it to shift left click can anyone help me so it's just left click D;

replies.body:
Unfortunately, switching out the mouse bindings isn't a feature available in the settings at the moment. Some players switch these out manually, but since you have to modify files to make this change, it isn't something we support.

Let me know if you have any questions.
